description.value:
Crafted from black iron, this crude suit of +2 resilient full plate is designed to make you look like a horned demon, with your face peering out of the screaming maw of the beast.

While wearing the armor, you can attack with the helmet's horns. They are a martial melee weapon with the effects of a +2 weapon potency rune. They deal 2d8 piercing damage and have the deadly d12 trait. On a critical hit with the horns, the target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] against the Abyssal plague disease. The horns can't be etched with any runes.

If you aren't evil, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} and can't recover from this condition while wearing demon armor.

Activate D Command

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Translocate].

Craft Requirements You are evil; supply one casting of dimension door.
